tripreview.Title: "Pathetic experience!"
tripreview.sentence: Dirty water, stale food, absolutely no service attitude, Why do everybody our there behave so hot-headedly?
Absolute waste of time.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing Experience!!!"
tripreview.sentence: The water rides particularly were very good!
The restaurants inside were not that good!
But overall arrangements were good!

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla (Veegaland)"
tripreview.sentence: The first amusement park in Kochi was set up in 2000.
It is promoted by Kochouseph Chittilappilly and his son Arun Chittilappilly.
The popular Wonder la Amusement Park in Kochi, which was initially called Veegaland until it was re-branded in April 2011 is situated on the top of a hill at Pallikkara.

tripreview.Title: "one of my favorite"
tripreview.sentence: This is one of my favorite amusement parks in Kerala.
I have visited here many times during my vacation to Kerala.
Must See in my opinion!

tripreview.Title: "Best place for family fun in kerala"
tripreview.sentence: WonderLa Kochi is a real wonder in Kerala .
Kids were excited about this trip but my concern was about the quality and hygiene because of the water rides.
To my surprise, this park was very well maintained and kept clean .
the water quality is well maintained.
The rides were also very fun and exciting .
we have enjoyed the trip and will go again.
Weekwnds, will be very crowded so plan your trip effectively.
The 3d shows are not good and may cause headache to someone.
So you may avoid those as it can spoil the trip .
All water rides are amazing and never miss it .
my only concern is there was no taxi or public transport around there.
So be prepared.

tripreview.Title: "Enjoyment Thriller Enjoyment"
tripreview.sentence: The water rides are awesome and super .

tripreview.sentence: A great place to get your children and enjoy one full day.

A must see place in Cochin.

tripreview.Title: "One of the best Amusement Parks ever."
tripreview.sentence: This is one place you got to visit with your family and kids, Lots of ride and the best part is they are very hygienic.
They have lots of water rides and also family exclusive areas.
We love to keep going every year.

tripreview.Title: "Earlier called Veegaland, this is a fun-packed site in Kochi !"
tripreview.sentence: Went here with family and friends.
It was fun being in the water in summer with friends.
The rides were amazing and it was a good ambience.
Good place to be in, while in the vicinity of Kakanad, Kochi.

tripreview.Title: "Just Adventurous"
tripreview.sentence: Supperb Amusement Parks Of I Visited In Kerala I have Seen
Awesome Rides and Things to do Nice Superb And Horrible Place
Wave Pool Is Alsob A Good Thing In The Park

tripreview.Title: "average"
tripreview.sentence: It was an interesting experience, however you probably can visit similar parks in your country.

tripreview.Title: "Best Amusement park of kerala"
tripreview.sentence: This is a decent amusement park with lot of rides.
Both land and water rides are pretty good.

The queues are long on season filled with many school and college kids, but the hack is to go for water rides first,then dry off and go for land rides if you really want to save time as everyone else will do the opposite.

tripreview.Title: "Some really scary and amazing rides but the park stinks!!!"
tripreview.sentence: This amusement park -hands down- has some of the most thrilling, exciting and exhilarating rides that you could find all across India, Maverick being the most scariest as per me.
Twin flip monster, Space gun and vertical fall come at 2nd, 3rd and 4th place respectively on the thrill scale.
We missed many of the water rides coz of hygiene and safety concerns.
The rides from a distance look safe and secure but once you are on em, you tend to feel a little insecure.
One of the passengers in Space Gun got stuck and the ride was stopped for 20-25 minutes just to get him out.
However, the biggest turn-off was unfortunately the people (not all) present in this park with their disgusting foul smell that pervaded almost all the queues towards the rides.
I am sorry to say but their uncivil, discourteous and impolite behavior stands out as the biggest shortcoming/downside of this park.
People were staring, breaking lines, dancing like monkeys and doing weird stuff which i feel should have been properly controlled by the authorities in a strict and stern manner.
The security guards standing there (except a few) seemed helpless and didn't seem to bother about the inconvenience caused by the rowdy crowd to the 'more civilized' people present in the park.
The shower area and changing rooms stink too.
We had to specially rent a hotel room for 3 hours just to take shower in a more cleaner and hygienic place.
There is no variety of food in the park restaurants and we had to settle down with ice cream as our lunch.
My advice: Take the fast track tickets- Believe me they are totally worth it.

tripreview.Title: "Best for Family Trip"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla is also known as Veegaland .
This place is best for family and group tours it gives a full day of enjoyment for you.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing Experience"
tripreview.sentence: Lots of rides, long queues.
It was a total fun experience.
Opt for fast track tickets only if you are short on time.
The fast track tickets are almost double the price of regular tickets.
Good changing rooms and locker facility.

tripreview.Title: "www.gostar.in"
tripreview.sentence: one of the best place to visit Wonderla Amusement Park is specially attracts childrens from 3 - 10 years of age.

tripreview.Title: "water park is outstanding"
tripreview.sentence: skip the dry rides and get to water park before noon.
the crowd moves to waterpark after dry rides and it gets very busy after noon.

tripreview.Title: "Decent"
tripreview.sentence: A good place to visit with your family.
I believe it could be much better, but due to lack of other theme parks in the area they are not being forced to innovate.

tripreview.Title: "Amazing rides and ecofriendly park"
tripreview.sentence: Jet privilege no 140923440 I am regular visitor to the park ever since its inaugration in 2001.
Masterplan of the great Kochouseph chittillapilly founder of vguard,the park was veegaland which recently renamed as Wonderla as a part of unification with the theme park at bangalore.
Pallikkara is around 20kms from cochin railway station and 10kms from Kakkanad ,the IT hub.
You are provided a welcome with luscious plants and flowers atop stone walled hairpin bends.
The place is crowded throughout the year.
Excellent choice of eateries that provides homely food mainting excellent hygiene standards.
Lot of rides to choose from.
must try the vertical fall,wave pool in water rides and cinemagic ,vintage torando in land rides.
for the adventure junkies ,go for twin flip monster and space gun.
Well trained and amiable staff.
you can expect a mixed crowd throughout the year.

tripreview.Title: "Best amusement park available"
tripreview.sentence: excellent amusement park with new rides, the safety they provide is also appreciable.
It will be better if they can reduce the rate a bit.
It will be better if they can reduce the rate a bit.
It will be better if they can reduce the rate a bit.

tripreview.Title: "wonderla"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla Amusement Park in Kochi, previously known as Veega Land, is located 15 km from Kochi city and is home to 59 amusement rides.

tripreview.Title: "Great way to spent a day"
tripreview.sentence: I have been to wonderla(earlier called as veegaland) many times.
its the best water theme park available in India.
once you pay the entry fare, multiple entries are permitted for any rides.
water is clean and all land rides are safe.
They keep on insreasing the rides every year.

tripreview.Title: "The Best and safe Amusement Park in Kerala"
tripreview.sentence: With the thrill, dry, water and kids rides Wonderla amusement park at Pallikkara may be the best of its kind in Kerala and is worth spending a day.
Though we have been to Wonderla (formerly Veega land) I went there with family and by 11.30 AM the park was almost full with families with kids.

My sons favorite is the Wonder Splash where we step onto a log raft and inch your way on a conveyor track into a cave filled with mystery and then drop down fast into the shallow pool making a splendid splash that will soak all the riders.
It is safe and not scary too.
The wave pool is another attraction which we can enjoy and it creates a feel of swimming in a sea.
Other water rides like Boomerang, Family slide and Rapid River are also interesting.

I am generally scared of the thriller rides but my family enjoyed the rides Maverick which turns, twists, go upside down etc, The Thunder fall which will take you to the heights and then fall free to the ground level, Twin Flip Monster which go spinning and swirling, Vintage Tornado the rocker coaster etc.

I enjoyed the Dry Rides like Cinemagic which is a combination of video, audio and swinging seats, dancing wheel which takes us for a circular and up and down ride, Hang Glider which is a rope way journey and apart from the few mentioned several other dry rides are there for those who like adventurous rides.
Rides for Kids like jumping frogs, jumping horses, Magic Plane, Kiddies wheel, Castle Jet, Balloon Tower etc and a lot more for the kids to enjoy are there.
The main advantage of all the Rides is that they are supposed to be cent percent safe.
The Amusement Park has facilities like Dress changing rooms, Lockers, Cloak Room, ATM, First Aid facilities, Prayer rooms, Baby feeding rooms, Purified drinking water etc.
and ample parking space.
Smoking is prohibited in the premises.
The staffs are very attentive and explain in detail to the visitors about all facilities, ride etc.

tripreview.Title: "Water fun for a hot day"
tripreview.sentence: Very well organised, nevertheless too often you find long queues for the best attractions.
Strange, for somebody coming from abroad, to see young boys and girls taking bath and splash in water, but completely dressed.
Basic animation.
The day we went a heavy storm broke up in the afternoon, so we couldn't enjoy the late and night attractions.
Quite average, I would say, but a surprise for India

tripreview.Title: "Fun day...."
tripreview.sentence: This was our 2nd visit to wonderla in 3 years.
Since the holiday season was on - the crowd was too much.
Anyway you can take a fast track ticket for double the cost and skip the large queue.
However if you are going on a normal off season day i do not recommend the fadst track ticket as they are quite expensive!
They have a lot of rides for kid - overall good amusement park.

tripreview.Title: "Fun day"
tripreview.sentence: Well worth the visit.
Waterslides were great.
Just a warning,be careful what you choose to go on,as the power does go out sometimes.
Segways a great ride.

tripreview.sentence: gud place for some water entertainment.

the food inside also good, very nice place.
a must to visit and value for money.

a must revisit place to have a day fulfilled overwhelming fun.

tripreview.sentence: Basically wonderla is one of the best amusement park group in india they do have in bangalore and coming soon in Hyderabad, I recommend to visit you will have good time there will be packages for purchasing tickets if you going for weekends and holidays there will be big queue at every ride so opt FASTTRACK Tickets in which you can save your time and you will complete all your Rides
if you are going for weekdays no problem
If you are group you can save lot of money for Photo Package

tripreview.sentence: You can enjoy a great time with friends
clean surroundings, healthy food

tripreview.sentence: Awesome experience.

healthy food.

It saves us from taking paper currency in pockets to get any food or drinks or stuff.
There are many breathtaking moments in space gun, free fall etc.
Water games are superb
Even after spending a whole day there, we were not contended.

tripreview.Title: "Wonderla -"
tripreview.sentence: Had a great time with my friends.
The hill top hangout place gives you a fresh feel.
Neat and clean.
Two times, I visited the park.

tripreview.Title: "Awesome, Great, Amazing and Wonderful Wonder La amusement park for everyone. Never missed to visit WONDER LA."
tripreview.sentence: If you are in or around Kochi, Never missed visit to Wonderla amusement park.
This one of the Best in India.
There are many kind of rides available.
Inside amusement park = Rides : Water rides, Dry rides, Thrill rides, Kids rides.
There are also 3d theater name is XD max and Cinemagic ride.
Both show wow amazing.
You and your friends and family I sure say wow amazing experience.
Musical fountain and Laser show also very very lovely.
Thall all are in include just in one ticket, Not pay any extra for any ride or show.
You will have to pay only for your food.
Ticket rate: 730 (Monday to Friday) 912 (Sat-Sunday-holiday) per person.
Fast track ticket also available in 1460 and 1830 per person respectively.
Fast track ticket benefits is you will not have to wait for ride in queue.
in vacation and holidays there so much rush so sometime you will have to join queue for your ride.
If you do not like to wait for your ride so buy fast track ticket, it's costly but save your time for ride.
Food : Food quality is very good and very affordable too.
tea, Coffee, snacks, Idli, Biryani(veg and non veg both), Biscuits, cookies, fast food, wefers available.
All food come with good quality.
Food stall staffs are very good.
Medical emergency : WonderLa have a own ambulance there so you need not worry about medical emergency.
They provide fast medical service if something happen.
WonderLa staffs are very helpful and friendly.
You can easily access your query solution from there about park.
Parking : Parking facilities is best there.
Very huge area of parking.
Your vehicle is safe there.
Suggestion : --- Please reach at park on morning time when open.
so you can enjoy all rides without missing any ride.
--- XD max, Cinemagic, Laser show Musical fountain show under schedule timing.
Best to visit these at afternoon time after lunch.
--- Please always keep your children with you.
Park is very big and people rush is very huge so take more care of your children.
--- Teenegers please be confident first before enter to any ride.
Some rides are very horrible.
(Twin flip monster, Super jumper, Space gun, Maverick, Thunder fall etc.
) Heart patient don't go on above ride.
---Locker available so best to get locker and put your ornaments and other things there.
Enjoy there for new experience.
Wonderful Wonder La.

tripreview.Title: "Lots of fun"
tripreview.sentence: We spent nearly 2 months traveling in India as a family and Australian friends of ours recommended that we visited Wonderla in Kochi.
On our last day before leaving the country, we visited the park with our 2 kids (14 and 12 year old).
It was quite an experience for everyone.
It was a packed vacation day for the locals and visitors, and it seemed that we were the only foreign tourists in the park.
Everything is very clean and the changing rooms were very spacious.
We enjoyed the water park a lot and decided to pay for the Fast Track tickets due to the crowded lines.
We met several locals and posed for lots of pictures.
Lunch was good and cheap at one of the fast food restaurants.
At the end of the day our 14-year-old mentioned that it was his favorite day of our visit to India.
It was certainly a great way to finish a memorable trip to India!

tripreview.Title: "Affordable amusement park"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla has 2 outlets in India - Bangalore and Kochi.
I visited the Kochi outlet.
What I liked about it compared to other similar outlets in India (eg Adlabs Imagica, Pune and Essel world Water Kingdom) is 1.
Parking absolutely free 2.
No restrictions in carrying food items / beverages in the park (no hoardings mentions prevention neither frisking) 3.
In the event you have to eat / drink from different options available inside the park they are reasonably priced 4.
Pricing for entry tickets is quite reasonable I would recommend fast track as it is crowded (we chose) so no waiting.
Only thing fast track not sold online Cons: Park timings are 11 - 6 pm only on weekdays which gives lesser time in the park considering it has both dry and wet rides (so you waste time in changing).

tripreview.Title: "Best place to be with family"
tripreview.sentence: Had a great time with family.
Nice and neat place.
Well organized.
If you can afford, please go for FastTrack to make sure, time is not wasted in waiting lines.

tripreview.sentence: I have been there multiple times and each time I go, I find new rides set up.

Clean and neat.

Better than wonderla in Bangalore.
My son loves this place and every time to kerala this is a must visit place for me and my family.
A day full of fun for family.
Food is available in plenty.

tripreview.Title: " Enjoy, it's pure fun !!"
tripreview.sentence: It was pure fun and thoroughly enjoyed every bit.
A great opportunity to make friends with your kids.
The park is well maintained with very courteous and welcoming staff.
It is nicely spread out with areas for wet and dry activities.
It also has a number of cafes, restaurants and ice cream parlours.
All areas especially the pools, toilets, changing areas are all kept very clean and look pretty hygienic.
We actually saw a staff taking samples and testing the pool water, it was a very reassuring sight.
Go there with your family and friends, it will definitely be a memorable day.

tripreview.Title: "Sparkling day"

tripreview.Title: "The best amusement park I've ever visited."
tripreview.sentence: One of the best water-themed amusement parks in India.
One of the safest too.
Our family had the best time ever.
The food court isn't bad either.
The rides are exhilarating and mind blowing.
The only negative is that if you misplace any belongings, there's very little chance of finding it or getting it back.

tripreview.Title: "The last word for Amusements in Kerala !!!"
tripreview.sentence: Wonderla has 55 land and water-based rides.
The park features a wide variety of attractions including some rides, water rides, a musical fountain and laser shows, a virtual reality show.
Wonderla has conference facilities for up to 1,000 persons, and features five restaurants with a total seating capacity of 1,150.
It has locker rooms with over 2,350 lockers and restrooms and showers.
[citation needed] The park also features a first aid facility and a paging system.
Wonderla opened its resort, an 84-room hotel complex spread over 100,000 square feet to public in 2012.
The resort features dedicated children's play areas and other recreational and conferencing facilities.
